{{title|{{tt|std::reference_wrapper}} 的推导指引}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/reference_wrapper/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|functional}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|
template&lt; typename T &gt;
reference_wrapper( T&amp; ) -&gt; reference_wrapper&lt;T&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

为 {{lc|std::reference_wrapper}} 提供[[cpp/language/class template argument deduction|推导指引]]以支持单独类模板形参的推导。
